question: Question_03_(c)
statement:
\textbf{Full-Solution Problem.} Justify your answer and \textbf{show all
your work.} Simplification of your answer is not required.

Evaluate the following integral

\begin{align*}\displaystyle \int \frac{dx}{(5 - 4x - x^{2})^{3/2}}\end{align*}
hints:
Try to modify the integrand in order to perform a trigonometric
substitution.

Complete the square in the denominator and make an appropriate
trigonometric substitution.
